title: 2 Bedroom Apartment Available NOW *VIRGINIA ESTATES*
posting_body: ['***RENT SPECIAL: APPLY THE SAME DAY AS YOUR SHOWING & GET A $500 RENT CREDIT!', '*** CALL TODAY FOR MORE DETAILS', 'REMODELED, REMODELED, REMODELED- TOP TO BOTTOM-', 'ALL THE BELLS AND WHISTLES!', 'Virginia Estates Apartments offers COMPLETELY REMODELED 2 bedroom apartment homes in Saint Louis Park, MN.', 'These apartment homes feature new gleaming cabinetry, counter tops, flooring, lighting, 6 panel doors, top of the line tiled bath and so much more', 'Minutes from shopping, Knollwood Mall, dining, recreational opportunities, entertainment and much more!', 'Convenient to Downtown Minneapolis.', 'Lease Terms: Month-to-Month rental agreement with a 9 month clause.', '$40 Application Fee per adult', '$500 Deposit', 'Cats accepted with the following restrictions:', '$250 non-refundable pet fee, $30 monthly pet rent, a limit of 2 cats per unit, and must be spayed/neutered.', 'Utilities: We pay for your heat, water, sewer, and trash pick-up.', 'Resident is  responsible for electricity, cable and internet.', '*Prices are subject to change at anytime.']
